name: Create new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet from new content in Drupal
description:
This template regularly checks for new content in Drupal and uses the retrieved information to create new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet. 

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1LVSw5xn7mLpFtZnkaUoWIFIb_tLqnWDLPJFzvR7kPS8/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet as the destination for the content metadata from Drupal. You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template by clicking on the clock icon on the first module.
